name: Skar(N)ification
description:
8 tracks of old school death metal

01. This Is War
02. Zumungu The Priest
03. The End Of Day
04. Macabre Strength
05. The Nine Lives Of Death
06. Infamous Beast
07. 72 Hours
08. Skar(n)ification

-----------------------------------------------------------------------------------
Review

....Able to play extremely heavy and build insurmountable bastions of violence purest: this makes the Styx without calling into question some kind of technical or instrumental developments. An example of how you played a really good record death metal, in which we understand well the band that created and you can not differentiate very well inside....
